entry.title: Monday: Periods of snow. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow and local blowing snow. Local amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 15 this morning and minus 20 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 24. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Monday 13 February 2023
